column4: if you have a nifty app that publishes stuff, shouldn't there be an option to at least see what data is published to start with?
I thought Ubuntu was interested in privacy
can you send me a link to where it was security reviewed?
how would I go about finding the link then ikonia?
it does not tell you the exact details of what it is sending
it asks a series of questions, you answer them, you type in your launchpad email address and then it send the info
just so we are on the same page I ran it by going to the following menu: System -> Administration -> Hardware testing
in related news, Your Computer Is Broadcasting An IP Address
yes, but it's not broadcasting my CPUs UUID
can you give a specific example of why that would be a privacy problem?
I know *you* do, but then you didn't ask my name publicly on the channel
well, personally is stretching it, but we both know where we know each other from
